messages.message:
Hi @Victor Zeng, how did you fix this? It's happening for my sandbox as well. I have created this sandbox today only, and it has the PR that @Xindi Xu mentioned above. But still facing the same issue.
Sandbox: https://https--chatbot-gautam-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/settings/billing
Error:-
```"Unexpected 400 from https://api.metronome.com/v1/contracts/create: Error code: 400 - {'message': '[instance type (null) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: [\"string\"])]'}"```
Just revived my sandbox and was able to create an org on the first try. Weird

This is interesting. I set the loglevel to DEBUG on aihub-sandbox, and this is the request we're sending:
```2025-07-03T18:05:04.702786228Z stdout F level=DEBUG time=2025-07-03 18:05:04,702 msg="Request options: {'method': 'post', 'url': '/v1/contracts/create', 'files': None, 'idempotency_key': 'stainless-python-retry-e9002e24-6730-48ce-8f4a-33df3b9011c3', 'json_data': {'customer_id': '965e731e-60bd-49c5-94db-cf6e2c14f069', 'starting_at': '2025-07-03T00:00:00+00:00', 'credits': [{'access_schedule': {'schedule_items': [{'amount': 7500, 'starting_at': '2025-07-03T00:00:00+00:00', 'ending_before': '2025-07-17T00:00:00+00:00'}]}, 'product_id': None, 'name': 'AI Hub Commercial Free Trial'}], 'custom_fields': {<ContractKeys.IS_TRIAL: 'is_trial'>: 'true'}, 'ending_before': '2025-07-17T00:00:00+00:00', 'overrides': [{'starting_at': '2025-07-03T00:00:00+00:00', 'product_id': 'd18197d7-2a05-4649-99da-8aeb55487993', 'entitled': False}], 'rate_card_alias': 'aihub-default', 'uniqueness_key': '965e731e-60bd-49c5-94db-cf6e2c14f069-aihub-commercial-free-trial'}}"  path="/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/metronome/_base_client.py:480" process="MainProcess" thread="ThreadPoolExecutor-4_2" trace_id="db54f2a4f5d19192"```

`product_id` is `None` , even though we're initalizing it properly:
```2025-07-03T18:05:04.700553521Z stdout F level=INFO time=2025-07-03 18:05:04,700 msg="Initializing trial credit product id: b03250cd-211a-469d-85f9-439dd37c439b"  path="/instabase-api-server/py/instabase/metronome/client.py:105" process="MainProcess" thread="ThreadPoolExecutor-4_2" trace_id="db54f2a4f5d19192"```
@Victor Zeng Can I fix it somehow for my sandbox??
@Gauti pull master. See the thread in <#C052YKRTJP5|>
